text: Jerry Junior Wiltshire (born 4 February 1996) is an English-born, British Virgin Islands football player who currently plays for Maidenhead United in the National League. ==Career== Wiltshire attended Whitmore High School and West Herts CollegeCareer success for Centre of Football Excellence students before joining Bethel University in Tennessee, where he scored twice in 18 games. He played club soccer for Memphis City and Chattanooga before returning to college soccer at the University of West Florida in 2018. He also played for Peachtree City MOBA and Des Moines Menace before returning to England to sign for Maidenhead United after a successful trial in September 2020. ==International career== Wiltshire scored on his international debut for the British Virgin Islands in a 2–2 draw with the Turks and Caicos Islands. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Peachtree City MOBA |2018 |PDL |13||0||0||0||0||0||13||0 |- |Des Moines Menace |2019 |USL2 |6 |0 |1 |0 |1 |0 |8 |0 |- |Maidenhead United |2020-21 |National League |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 |0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !19!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0!!21!!0 |} ;Notes ===International=== . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
